markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs=""
>
[Life's Last Breath](/Equipment.aspx?ID=659)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 23,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Rhoka Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=120)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The twin serrated blades of this legendary [rhoka sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=120) are dull black and constantly drip with blood. _Life's Last Breath_ is said to have been forged centuries ago for an unknown [urdefhan](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=158) general and has since fallen into the hands of countless other powerful urdefhan warlords.

 _Life's Last Breath_ is a _+3 greater striking [unholy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=307) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) rhoka sword_ with the following special abilities.

<document level="2" id="action-509" />

<document level="2" id="action-510" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Life's Last Breath
